description: This module is used to configure GslbService object

enabled.description: Enable or disable the gslb service.

domain_names.description: Fully qualified domain name of the gslb service.

ttl.description: Ttl value (in seconds) for records served for this gslb service by the dns service.

health_monitor_scope.description: Health monitor probe can be executed for all the members or it can be executed only for third-party members.

down_response.description: Response to the client query when the gslb service is down.

state.description: The state that should be applied on the entity.

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

description.description: User defined description for the object.

wildcard_match.description: Enable wild-card match of fqdn  if an exact match is not found in the dns table, the longest match is chosen by wild-carding the fqdn in the dns

use_edns_client_subnet.description: Use the client ip subnet from the edns option as source ipaddress for client geo-location and consistent hash algorithm.

groups.description: Select list of pools belonging to this gslb service.

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

controller_health_status_enabled.description: Gs member's overall health status is derived based on a combination of controller and datapath health-status inputs.

url.description: Avi controller URL of the object.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

health_monitor_refs.description: Verify vs health by applying one or more health monitors.

num_dns_ip.description: Number of ip addresses of this gslb service to be returned by the dns service.

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
